description:
Description
Panel data on gasoline consumption in 18 OECD countries over 19 years, 1960–1978.
title: Gasoline Consumption Data

parameters.cars: Logarithm of the stock of cars per-capita.
parameters.gas: Logarithm of motor gasoline consumption per car.
parameters.price: Logarithm of real motor gasoline price.

format: A data frame containing 342 observations on 6 variables.
